name: 夢 'Yume'/ Dream
description:
This anime style self-portrait was used for my single "Dream" and was also featured on the album art "III".
You can also see a sticker with this Japanese symbol "夢" which translates to Dream. - https://kalax.bandcamp.com/track/dream

Dream was also featured in a fan-made music video with over two million views. - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aquTeAH_C4I

Drawn by myself back in 2018.
1200 X 1200 px
JPG
